item.title: WorldBuilder 0.1.1
item.description: ### ðŸ“‹ Changelog - Fix bug where project creation failed if default projects directory didn't exist. - Fix various auto updater issues. - App now forces check for updates on startup. - Fix default install path missing a directory separator.
